name: SCHÖS | ЩЁС
description:
SCHÖS | ЩЁС

SCHÖS (cyrillic: ЩЁС) is an experimental exploration project developed by Infernal Grape × Danya Gonsales.

Schös is heavily influenced by exploration non-games, modern and industrial architecture, brutalist and concrete constructions, avant-garde and contemporary art, graphic design, and experimental music.

This is a work in progress. Preview build was released in November 4, 2019.

Current version (0.1b) is short and takes an approximate time of 5 to 15 minutes to beat.

Music and sound design by:

Grush.k
Chronomantique
Skinny
Esotherika
khdl
Infernal Grape
Danya Gonsales
